fields.summary: Load data into text table fail caused by IndexOutOfBoundsException

comments.body: When load a file which is small than 3 bytes, this issue happens.
This is already fixed in HIVE-13185. Perhaps that patch should be backported.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12824114/HIVE-14556.1.patch
